name: Wilde Beest [Alpha]
description:
Wilde Beest is a TTRPG inspired by media like Monster Hunter, Studio Ghibli Films and Dauntless.

In Wilde Beest you play a Shepherd, an individual tasked with protecting villages from large creatures known as Beests.

You are a lone traveler sometimes, other jobs require some team work but in any case you are always connected not only to your community but to the world.

This game was made for those who want to visit far off places, lay in sunny patches of grass, herd sheep, witness nature being every bit as fericious as it is beautiful.

I hope this game brings joy on rainy days, is a way to connect with friends you may not have seen in awhile or a chance to maybe get away from it all for just awhile.

This is just an alpha of the game and we can not wait to show you all the full game early next year. Please let us know how you enjoyed it by filling out our feedback form
